long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
comSlider is an online html slideshow maker, image slider or presentation creator, fully customizable with amazing visual effects. Build your own slideshow with unique look & feel that just perfect fits with your web page.  

Very easy integration on any web page with simple copy&paste of a single line source code (comSlider snippet code) anywhere into your website's HTML. For a seamless integration with some leading website builder platforms  (e.g. Moonfruit, Yola, Weebly, Jimdo, Wix, IM Creator, ...) you can use a customized comSlider snippet. 
With embedding by a code snippet, your slideshow will be hosted on one of the world's most reliable infrastructure. Google's proven cloud infrastructure provides highly available and robust storage for your slideshows. Or, of course, you can download whole slideshow package and add it on your web server.

So, no coding, no image editing, no learning curve, no software to download. Simply upload your photos, select a template and comSlider will do its magic!

Main features:
• fancy transition and visual effects (eg. ken burns, flippy, explode, fade, swing, dodge, strip, zoom, rotate, ...), fancy templates
• flying captions support (add animated objects(button, image, text, ...) on each slide)
• tap & swipe support for mobile devices
• responsive templates
• online creating, anytime updating and maintenance of your slideshows
• fully customizable text/HTML description with Google Fonts support
• very easy integration into any web page with simple copy&paste of a HTML snippet code
• or download it and use it on any web page with no limits
• no learning curve, no software to download
• free of a charge with view/storage quota limitations, or flexible premium packages are available for advanced users
